body:
Hey everyone from your new Music God!
Decided to host a little party on the Avicus teamspeak (ts.avicus.net) for a bit more than an hour!
Join on and request your own songs here!
They will be played in order so don't worry if you don't hear your song right after you requested it!
Please no troll songs/trolling nor anything inappropriate!
We are all here to have a fun time :)
Have a great day and can't wait to see you all on teamspeak :)

title: Music Party on Teamspeak! [Ended]

replies.body: ITS SO MUCH FUN GUYS JOIN IT
